channel.title: What does "working" mean here?
channel.description: Recent content on What does "working" mean here?

item.title: Home
item.description: Background I’m a software “engineer” and a Science, Technology & Society scholar. I focus on intersections of software and social experience, especially the social aspects of software work. Work I’m in the process of completing a Masters in Science, Technology & Society at Drexel University. My ongoing masters project is hosted on github. I’ve previously worked as a software engineer for a series of startups that no longer exist and briefly for Qualcomm after an acquisition.
